title: Client lag
body:
Hello everyone! So I got this client problem now(9/28/2017). When I invite a friend to my lobby, it can't start, then we can't even leave the lobby. so I wanted to ask: Does: anyone got the same problem? And also it says that ranked games is unavailable, can that problem be because of this?
Btw my internet is fine.

replies.body: This may have been a result of recent EUNE issues.  is everything okay now?
